description: What is the share of respondents who think politicians should talk about the NHS?
Identify the issue with the highest share of respondents.
Calculate the total share of respondents for 'European Union' and 'Economic growth'.
Is there a strong correlation between 'Immigration' and 'Living standards' in terms of share of respondents?
Determine the range of the share of respondents across all issues.
Order the issues from the highest to the lowest share of respondents.
Identify any issue that has a significantly lower share of respondents compared to others.
What percentage of the issues have a share of respondents greater than 0.3?
Find any clusters of issues with similar shares of respondents.
Which issues have a share of respondents between 0.2 and 0.3?
